description: Returns the FileSystemPolicy for the specified EFS file system. This operation requires permissions for the elasticfilesystem:DescribeFileSystemPolicy action.

parameters.name: FileSystemId
parameters.description: Specifies which EFS file system to retrieve the FileSystemPolicy for.

nested_items.name: FileSystemId
nested_items.description: Specifies the EFS file system to which the FileSystemPolicy applies.

nested_items.name: Policy
nested_items.description: The JSON formatted FileSystemPolicy for the EFS file system.
